name: Starbound Server Account Generator
tagline: Easily generate accounts, banned users, ips and playernames for Starbound!
body:
### Starbound Server Account Generator
The easiest way to manage Starbound server accounts! Written in Java, this provides a simple GUI to easily modify Starbound's accesscontrol.config file, which holds the banned usernames, ips and player names as well as account names and passwords for players that can join. 

### Getting the app
If you want to simply download the latest file, you can get it from [here](https://github.com/DanilaFe/Starbound-Server-Account-Generator/tree/master/version).
If you want to compile it yourself for whatever reason, you can do 
```
git clone https://github.com/DanilaFe/Starbound-Server-Account-Generator.git
```
and then open the project using NetBeans. (Or any IDE for that matter, the code is the same.)

### Contributing
If you wish to help, you can! Anything is appreciated - simply testing the application and reporting bugs all the way to adding code to the project. You simply have to request it from me from the "Contact Me" section below. I will gladly give you the permission to modify the repo.

### Contact me
If you have any questions or comments you would rather deliver by email, you can send me an email at [nothingnut@gmail.com](mailto:nothingnut@gmail.com)
